adhirajyawadi yuddhaya ha kamkaru panthiya daridrathawaye helima sandaha “deshapalana pa්rathigamithwaya, jathikawadaya, sanka්ramanika wirodhi wargawadaya wani itha pasugami manogathin itha sukshama lesa waga diga kara atha.”

digu kalinawa mema thaththwaya pawathimen wakugadu akarmanya wima siduwiya haki bawa soyagena atha.

wadidura adhyapanaya labannata ma samaga set wu mithuran atharin kettu shehan saha thadiya shehan ta amatharawa,ape bhashawen hondama bokka hewath hitha honda kollek wiya.mage jiwithaye ma dutu ahinsakama wun atharin palamu thana kettu shehan ta himiwana athara..dewana thana aniwaryayenma athkaraganne mohuya.thawada hariya,mana,shri,dore ge wyawaharayata anuwa,mohu enu dutu wita mata pawasanne "anna..umbae thaththa enawa" kiyaya.ese thaththa kiya kiwada apa dedena ekineka amathimedi kunuharupayakin thorawa adahas ho apage sanwada huwamaru karaganimata mali wannemu.thawada ekama widihe de walata asa nokarana muth ekama widihe de walata wairakarana apa dedena,ee pilibanda sith thula athide pakilimakin thorawa eliyata dammemu(ee pilibanda minpera lipiyakath sandahan kara atha.).
